titles.title: Protecting Child Trafficking Victim Witnesses Act
A bill to strengthen protections for child trafficking victims testifying against human traffickers.
Protecting Child Trafficking Victim Witnesses Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Protecting Child Trafficking Victim Witnesses Act
This bill establishes requirements for federal prosecutors to implement victim-centered protocols to strengthen protections for child trafficking victims who testify against human traffickers.
